title: Can we ask Allah to show us dream if we're struggling to make decision in something? assim al hakeem
transcript: foreign [Music] of making a decision or when unable to make a decision on our own and uh just struggling and we've tried all our best possible ways to do something and we don't see a proper answer answer for it can we like ask Allah and Dua for a dream that he guides us to a dream because we don't have anybody who can guide us you can do what you can ask Allah however if you see a dream this does not mean that it is from Allah shaytan can be messing up with your head so this is not a way to find out whether this decision is right for you or uh not an Allah Knows Best
